description: GenericControllerManagerConfiguration holds configuration for a generic controller-manager.

Address.description: address is the IP address to serve on (set to 0.0.0.0 for all interfaces).

ClientConnection.description: ClientConnection specifies the kubeconfig file and client connection settings for the proxy server to use when communicating with the apiserver.

ControllerStartInterval.description: How long to wait between starting controller managers

Controllers.description: Controllers is the list of controllers to enable or disable '*' means "all enabled by default controllers" 'foo' means "enable 'foo'" '-foo' means "disable 'foo'" first item for a particular name wins

Debugging.description: DebuggingConfiguration holds configuration for Debugging related features.

LeaderElection.description: leaderElection defines the configuration of leader election client.

LeaderMigration.description: LeaderMigration holds the configuration for Leader Migration.

LeaderMigrationEnabled.description: LeaderMigrationEnabled indicates whether Leader Migration should be enabled for the controller manager.

MinResyncPeriod.description: minResyncPeriod is the resync period in reflectors; will be random between minResyncPeriod and 2*minResyncPeriod.

Port.description: port is the port that the controller-manager's http service runs on.
